display_long_description:
# It's time to celebrate the 2025 Home Run Derby at MLB's All-Star Week in Atlanta!
Check out Truist Park, now decorated for baseball's biggest week, plus unlock new All-Star-themed batskins.

# GO BIG in MLB’s Home Run Derby VR! 
Welcome to the only officially licensed Major League Baseball game in VR!  Every team, every ballpark, right here and no place else.
# Experience the Thrill of a Real Home Run Derby:
- **Visceral Gameplay:** Feel the crack of the bat every swing with realistic physics and intuitive motion controls. 
- **Real MLB Ballparks:** Crush towering home runs in authentically rendered ballparks
- **Be the Best:** Compete against other players as you climb the leaderboards and earn incentives.
- **Progression & Customization Options:** Advance through a deep progression system, unlocking unique bats, gloves, trophies and more.
- **Build a Legacy:** Invite friends to your custom clubhouse, decorated with earned items showcasing your big accomplishments and unique style.  Plus: Watch the latest MLB news and highlights on the big screen from the best seat in the house!
# More Than Just a Game, it's a Major League Baseball Experience:
Home Run Derby VR puts you in the heart of baseball's most electrifying contest. Step into the batter's box, grip your virtual bat and unleash your inner slugger in a stunning, immersive VR experience.
# Download Home Run Derby VR today and become a legend!
[media]
